text: Dnes all dobry food robit lawful ona. food ludia scripture bol lawful for ona. I ona vydana chaste zensky believers i mat rad chaste zensky followers previous scripture zadovazit ona zaplatit them ich due dowries! Ona maintain chastity nie committing adultery, nor pocas secret lovers! Ktokolvek zamietnut faith all jeho zavodny bol v vain Hereafter he bol losers
